description:
Már elérhető a Libri ingyenes applikációja, mellyel számos előnyt élvezhet. Töltse le az appot és legyen törzsvásárlónk, hiszen akár 10%-ot is visszakaphat minden vásárlása végösszegéből, amit a későbbiekben újabb olvasmányok megvásárlására használhat fel. 


Értesüljön elsőként  legfrissebb akcióinkról és híreinkről, használja ki a Törzsvásárlói Program előnyeit egyetlen applikáció segítségével!  Ha már törzsvásárlónk, könnyedén digitalizálhatja Törzsvásárlói Kártyáját, hogy azt még kényelmesebben használhassa. Amennyiben még nem csatlakozott programunkhoz, az applikáció segítségével ezt is egyszerűen megteheti.

Make Learning Fun with Rody-Chick-Fun! Transform screen time into brain time! Rody-Chick-Fun is the perfect educational app designed to help children aged 4-10 develop essential cognitive skills through fun, engaging gameplay. WHY KIDS LOVE IT

Beautiful, colorful animations that capture attention
Instant feedback with celebration effects
No reading required - perfect for young learners
Achievable challenges that build confidence
Reward system with unlockable achievements
FOUR AMAZING GAMES Memory Cards
Find matching pairs in this classic memory game! 16 adorable emoji cards with smooth 3D flip animations help develop visual memory and concentration. Perfect for building focus and pattern recognition skills.Pattern Match
Watch, remember, and repeat! This Simon Says-style game challenges kids to memorize increasingly complex color sequences. Develops short-term memory, attention span, and sequential thinking. Color Match
Race against time to match colors! Fast-paced gameplay helps improve quick thinking, color recognition, and decision-making skills. Kids learn to process information quickly while having a blast. Shape Match
Find matching shapes and colors in this progressive puzzle game! Multiple difficulty levels adapt as your child improves, teaching logical thinking and problem-solving.
 TRACK PROGRESS
Individual best scores for each game
Total score tracking
6 unlockable achievement badges
Beautiful statistics charts
Celebrate every milestone!
 PARENT-APPROVED FEATURES
 100% Safe - No ads, no in-app purchases
 Privacy First - No data collection, completely offline
Age Appropriate - Designed specifically for ages 4-10
 Educational - Based on cognitive development principles
Screen Time Well Spent - Learning disguised as play
COPPA Compliant - Meets all child safety standards EDUCATIONAL BENEFITSCognitive Development:
Enhances short and long-term memory
Improves concentration and focus
Develops pattern recognition
Strengthens problem-solving abilities
Boosts processing speed

The largest catalog of audiobooks, ebooks, mindfulness and book summaries. In Romanian and English.

From fiction (thriller, romance, mystery) and up to business and personal development or children's books — you always have new things to discover.

Don't have time to read? Listen! At the gym, when you're running, driving, cooking, walking, or just relaxing — evolve, get inspired, and let in the next idea.

• Try it for free: unlimited reading and listening for 7 days
• One subscription, unlimited access to thousands of books
• Original & exclusive content: mindfulness meditation, book summaries
• New & fresh books narrated by famous voices are constantly added

PLAYER & READER:
• My Library: organize your favorite books
• Custom recommendations: discover books you didn't even know you wanted
• Sleep schedule: fall asleep with a good story
• Speed ​​control: assimilate information at your own pace

Ha neked is vannak üres óráid és szeretnél hasznos hanganyagokat hallgatni, utazás, sport vagy házimunka közben, akkor a VOIZ hangoskönyvtárat neked találták ki!

Az alkalmazást ingyen ki tudod próbálni, időkorlát nélkül!

A VOIZ hangoskönyvtárban hangoskönyveket hallgathatsz és vásárolhatsz.

Ingyenes használat esetén belehallgathatsz bármelyik könyv elejébe.
Ha ezután megteszik a hangoskönyv, megvásárolhatod az alkalmazásban.

A jövőben készülünk teljesen ingyenesen meghallgatható könyvekkel is!

Folyamatosan készítünk új hangoskönyveket. A jelenleg készülő hangoskönyvek elsősorban üzleti, motivációs és önfejlesztő könyvek.

Célunk, hogy rövid időn belül önfejlesztő, pszichológia és spirituális könyvek kerüljenek fel az applikációba, hogy bárki aki fejlődni szeretne az élete egy területén, az megtehesse azt. Legyen ez akár a párkapcsolata javítása, gyermeke nevelése, üzlete fellendítése, vagy kapcsolata a transzcendenssel. 

Természetesen az alkalmazásban megtalálhatóak szépirodalmi könyvek is, aki ezeket kedveli inkább.

A szülőkre gondolva pedig tervbe van, hogy a mesekönyv szekciót is kibővítjük.

Nagy izgalommal és szeretettel fejlesztjük neked az applikációt és azon vagyunk, hogy a lehető legjobb élmény legyen hangoskönyveket hallgatnod!

Emiatt nagyon várjuk a visszajelzésedet. Az alkalmazáson belül, a menünél, a "Kérdésed van? Írj nekünk!" menüpontban tudsz nekünk írni.

Várjuk az ötleteidet, hogy:
- milyen funkciókat fejlesszünk az applikációba
- milyen könyveket hallgatnál szívesen

Bármilyen megjegyzést szívesen veszünk, ne habozz nekünk írni!

Hasznos időtöltést kíván a VOIZ csapata!

Ui: Ha van egy könyved vagy te adsz ki könyveket és szeretnéd, ha a könyveid bekerüljenek az appba, ne habozz felkeresni minket! (Akár arra is lehetőséged van, hogy mi készítjük el neked a hanganyagot)

Uii: Sok követőd van, akik nyitottak az önfejlesztésre? Akkor írj nekünk, mert remek affiliate/parnter programunk van, amivel könnyen kialakíthatsz jelentős passzív jövedelmet. Ajánlj minket és mi nem leszünk szűkmarkúak!

Flashbook creates summaries of self-help books. These books cover topics like mindset, entrepreneurship, personal finance, investing, communication, positivity, health, and more. Our summaries are designed so you can read or listen to them in just 20 minutes. After reading or listening to our summaries, you can be sure you've covered all the important information!

An in-app subscription is required to access the full application.

Terms of Use: https://flashbook.app/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://flashbook.app/privacy-policy

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

[Enjoy Novelmates]
Novelmates is your gateway to a romantic world of addictive novels from various genres. Dive into captivating stories, explore new plots on those web novels. With Novelmates, immerse yourself into storytelling anytime, anywhere.

[Features]
1.Extensive Library: Access a diverse library of novels spanning multiple genres, including romance, mystery, fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and more.

2.Personalized Recommendations: Discover new novels tailored to your preferences based on your favorite novels and stories.

3.Bookmarking: Bookmark your favorite novels and never lose your place in a story.

4.Night Mode: Read comfortably in low-light conditions with the night mode feature, reducing eye strain.

5.Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless reading experience with smooth page-turning animations and intuitive navigation controls.

6.Subscriptions: Enjoy the unlimited reading experience without interruptions after subscribing, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story.

Discover the joy of reading with Novelmates and unlock a world of good novels. Download now and start your literary journey today!

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Enjoy storytelling that speaks to you with Audible. Discover a collection of audiobooks, podcasts and exclusive Originals for endless listening. Stay up to date on discounted membership plans and enjoy audio entertainment of all genres today with Audible.

Focus on health and wellness by diving into self help podcasts, fitness or meditation audiobooks. Follow the latest episode of a true crime podcast or binge a bestselling audiobook series. Explore an exciting library with thousands of titles including Harry Potter, The Midnight Seller, A Promised Land and Sherlock Holmes.

Relax to calming sounds or fall into a deep slumber with sleep stories. Stream audiobooks with CarPlay on your morning commute or listen to bestsellers on your Apple Watch while on a run — tackle your to-read list with Audible. Enjoy mental health podcasts or and listen seamlessly across different devices, with or without WiFi.

Find intriguing stories that speak to you and build your library with audiobooks to keep forever. Tap into the best of audio entertainment, today.

Start listening now!

AUDIBLE FEATURES

AUDIO ENTERTAINMENT FOR EVERYONE
Listen to thousands of audiobooks and podcasts. Build a library with a wide range of genres, like:
• Science fiction
• Crime and thriller
• Mindfulness and meditation
• Sleep stories
• Kids’ books
• Biographies
• Health and wellness
• Personal development
• Nonfiction, and more

UNPLUG & FEAST YOUR EARS
Listen to storytelling that enriches you with immersive audio experiences for every moment.
• Mindful meditation, relaxing sounds or sleep stories - relax with audio fit for every mood
• Let audiobooks and podcasts captivate you throughout your day
• Enjoy true crime stories during your commute or sci-fi books on a lazy Sunday

STORIES ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Queue up downloads, adjust your listening speed and experience seamless listening with Audible.
• Offline listening - stream or download directly to enjoy Audible with or without WiFi
• CarPlay allows you to easily connect your phone to your car for continued listening
• WhisperSync - seamlessly switch between reading on your Kindle and listening on Audible
• Sleep Timer - set a timer to automatically pause your audiobook

KIDS PROFILE
Create a Kids Profile for your child and share family-friendly listens from our extensive catalog of children’s audiobooks, podcasts and Originals, right from the app.

AUDIBLE MEMBERSHIP
Get the most from your subscription with discounts on our monthly plan. Try cash purchases for titles you love and benefit from discounted prices as an Audible member.

As an Audible member, enjoy unlimited listening for a single price:
• 1 credit per month to pick any title that you want to keep forever
• The Plus Catalogue - unlimited listening for thousands of Originals, podcasts & audiobooks
• Receive exclusive member only deals and get up to 80% off selected titles
• Permanent audio library - titles purchased with credits are yours to keep, even if you cancel


Need more? Purchase individual credits through the app and make the most of your Audible membership.

Experience a new form of health and wellness. Listen to storytelling that speaks to you, anytime, anywhere with Audible, an Amazon company.

-

If you subscribe to Audible via iTunes where available, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current membership period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each membership period at the rate of your selected plan. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

Discover stories that matter to you, from readers like you. Goodreads is the world's largest community of readers.

Find new and interesting books by browsing personalized recommendations based on books you've read and your favorite genres. See what your friends are reading, write book reviews, and keep track of what you want to read. Goodreads is a free service for book tracking, recommendations and reviews.

Use our barcode scanner the next time you are in a bookstore. Add the book in your hands to your "Want To Read" shelf and browse reviews before buying.

Features:

• Get personalized recommendations and discover new books based on your tastes.
• Goodreads Choice Awards: vote for your favorite books of the year and see the winners!
• Participate in the Reading Challenge!
• Book cover and barcode scanner!
• Keep a want-to-read list.
• See book reviews and updates from your friends.
• Discover new books and explore popular book lists.
• Rate and review books you read.
• Share notes and progress updates as you read.
• Recommend books to friends.
• Join online book clubs and connect with other readers.

By using this app, you agree to Goodreads’s Terms of Use (https://www.goodreads.com/about/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.goodreads.com/about/privacy).

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

Read iconic comic books like Superman, Batman, The Witcher, Invincible, The Boys, Transformers, Hellboy, The Walking Dead, The Umbrella Academy, and more—alongside exciting creator-made comics, manga, webcomics, and graphic novels.


NEW BOOKS DROP WEEKLY
Find new and interesting comics featured every week. Explore our library of 100,000+ releases through curated collections and see which comic books, creators, and themes are trending. Your next favorite is just a tap away.


GC VERTICAL ORIGINALS
Experience amazing comic book stories reimagined for vertical scroll. With over 1,200+ episodes across 30+ series, enjoy daily free episodes and new series weekly from top indie publishers and creators.


350+ PUBLISHERS AND THOUSANDS OF CREATORS
Enjoy comics from publishers including DC, Image Comics, Dark Horse, BOOM! Studios, ONI Press, TOKYOPOP, Mad Cave, and more. Read titles like Justice League, Superman, Nightwing, Joker, The Sandman, Stranger Things, Invincible, Power Rangers, Transformers, The Boys, The Walking Dead, and thousands more.


READING EXPERIENCE YOU'LL LOVE
Customize your experience—whether on phone or tablet, vertical scroll or double-page layout. Engage with comics your way, comment, follow creators, and jump between chapters with ease. For many titles, enjoy our panel-to-panel reading mode for a more cinematic experience.


ADVANCED SEARCH AND DISCOVERY
Find exactly what you’re looking for with powerful filtering by genre, art style, themes, format, audience, and more. Explore by dedicated publisher channels and discover new comic favorites beyond the algorithm.


OFFLINE READING
Take your comics on the go. Download and read offline with a GlobalComix Gold subscription.


TRACK TITLES & ORGANIZE COMICS
Bookmark your comic books with statuses like “Reading,” “On Hold,” or “Read Later.” Get notified about new releases from your favorite comics and creators.


CELEBRATE COMICS AND THE PEOPLE WHO CREATE THEM
GlobalComix is a creator-first platform where publishers and artists can publish directly and earn revenue. Up to 70% of your subscription fee supports the comics you love.


Join us and shape the future of comicbook storytelling.


If you’ve enjoyed reading on platforms like Comixology, you’ll find GlobalComix a fresh, modern experience—built for discovery, community, and reading your way.

Csatlakozz az e-könyvmolyok közösségéhez! 
Olvasd e-könyveidet vagy hallgasd e-hangoskönyveidet bárhol és bármikor, saját mobilodon vagy táblagépeden, plusz eszközök nélkül. A Bookline Readerrel nemcsak a könyvtárad lép szintet, hanem az olvasmányélményeid is. Töltsd le az appot és építsd velünk az ország egyik legnagyobb olvasóközösségét!

Hozd át e-könyveidet!
Itt minden átjárható, kompatibilis és működőképes. Formátumtól és a vásárlás helyétől függetlenül áthozhatod hozzánk korábbi e-könyveidet epub és pdf formátumban is.

Ingyenes használat
Nincs fizetős verzió, nincsenek olvasás közben felugró hirdetések, nincsenek korlátozások. 

Alakítsd kedvedre!
Számos egyedi funkcióval várunk: olvasói profilodat könnyedén személyre szabhatod, egyéni könyvgyűjteményeket állíthatsz össze, kiemelhetsz, jegyzetelhetsz, nyomon követheted az olvasási és hallgatási statisztikáidat! Mindez a regisztráció után azonnal elérhetővé válik számodra.

Hallgasd kedvenceidet!
Lejátszónkkal a történet akkor is folytatódhat, amikor épp nincs lehetőséged olvasni. Hallgasd digitális formátumú e-hangoskönyveidet utazás, sportolás vagy más napi teendőid közben, akár az egyszerűsített kezelésű autósmóddal vagy az esti hallgatásokhoz praktikus elalvási időzítővel is!

E-hangoskönyv-előfizetés
További ÚJDONSÁGKÉNT válogass megkötések nélkül folyamatosan bővülő e-hangoskönyv-kínálatunkból, ásd bele magad a legkülönbözőbb témákba, fedezz fel új szerzőket és hallgass nemzetközi bestsellereket kevesebb, mint egyetlen nyomtatott könyv áráért!

És hogy mitől lesz közös élmény az olvasás?
Mert ha valami jó dolog történik velük, azt szeretjük megosztani másokkal is. A Bookline Readeren már most is megoszthatod a könyvek alatt a véleményedet, dicsérhetsz, csillagozhatsz, vitázhatsz, lehúzhatsz. Hamarosan pedig még több frissítéssel jelentkezünk, amivel szorosabbra fűzheted a többi olvasóval a kapcsolatot.

MotoNovel is an innovative and user-friendly reading application, wholeheartedly committed to providing users with a wide range of high-quality collections of novel resources. This application is meticulously designed with the sole purpose of presenting users with truly outstanding and fascinating novel stories.

Read the latest chapters of "Toilet-bound Hanako-kun", "The Case Study of Vanitas", "Daemons of The Shadow Realm" AND MORE on SQUARE ENIX’s official "Manga UP!" app!

OVER 200 SERIES—all originally published by SQUARE ENIX—virtually FREE to read using daily bonus items. Here’s a small taste of our diverse lineup:
- My Dress-Up Darling
- Daemons of The Shadow Realm
- Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You
- Assassin & Cinderella
- I’m Glad They Kicked Me From The Hero’s Party... But Why’re you following me, Great Saintess?
- I’m the Only Monster Tamer in the World and Was Mistaken for the Demon Lord
- The Villainess' Butler: Death Flag Destroyer at Your Service
…And even more to be added in the future!

SIMULPUB RELEASES!
Stay up to date with your favorite series straight from Japan soon after they’re published!

READ THE ORIGINALS OF MEDIA TIE-INS!
You can read the originals of your favorite anime and dramas, such as "My Happy Marriage" and "The Apothecary Diaries"! Catch up with the latest episodes!

DISCOVER NEW SERIES!
Isekai, fantasy, romance, comedy, drama, anime tie-ins—with our expanding roster of original series from several genres, you can say you read it here first!

SUPPORT CREATORS!
Manga UP! is an official service run by the publisher, SQUARE ENIX. All contents on this app are protected under the law and profits are legally distributed to authors.

UNLOCK THOUSANDS OF CHAPTERS WITH THE VAULT PASS!
With a VAULT PASS subscription, you can read as many regular chapters as you want! The first trial is free for 7 days!

- Price
$6.99/month (7-day free trial)

- Offers
During the subscription period, you can read regular (non-ADVANCE) chapters of eligible series without consuming any items.
*Please refer to the application for more details.

- Billing
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account upon purchase confirmation and upon automatic renewal.
The subscription will be automatically renewed each month (subject to local restrictions). Your account will be charged $6.99 for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of your current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is turned off before the next period is charged.

- Management
To turn off auto-renewal, open the App Store app, tap the My Account icon at the top right, then tap Subscriptions. Please note that deleting this application or transferring your device will not stop your subscription.

- Cancellation
If you cancel your VAULT PASS (monthly), it will become invalid only after your current subscription period expires. This may take a few days.
You will be able to enjoy the benefits until your VAULT PASS (Monthly) becomes invalid.

All the books that you love. On the page or out loud. Anywhere you are.

Dive into a world of stories with Google Play Books! Explore millions of eBooks, audiobooks, comics and manga – all in one app.

Key Features: 
• Your library, anywhere: Enjoy books on your phone, tablet, computer or even in your car with CarPlay. Plus, you can download books to read offline.

• Organise with shelves: Personalise your digital library with custom shelves to categorise your books by genre, author or any theme that you’d like.

• Audio immersion: Enjoy a vast library of audiobooks with customisable playback speed, sleep timers and bookmarking to enhance your listening experience.

• Smart notes: Jot down notes while you read that sync with your Google Drive and can be shared for easy collaboration.

• Kid-friendly reading tools: Let kids explore word definitions or listen to books aloud. Note: Reading tools are available in English only.

• Immersive comics: Experience Bubble Zoom for a specialised comic and manga reading experience.

• Hands-free reading: Control your audiobook with your voice using Siri.

• Read your way: Customise your reading experience by adjusting the font, text size, brightness and more.

Millions of stories await on Google Play Books! Download now and start reading.

MANGA Plus by SHUEISHA, is the official manga reading service from Shueisha, that provides you with the latest chapters for free at the same time as in Japan. Immerse yourself in binge-worthy and anime-adapted comics like; One Piece, Chainsaw Man, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex, Jujutsu Kaisen, My Hero Academia, 【OSHI NO KO】, Dandadan and Red Cat Ramen.

Enjoy the first three and newest three chapters for FREE. Want to catch up on SPY x FAMILY, Kaiju No.8 (Monster #8), and Kagurabachi? You can read all chapters of currently ongoing manga in English once for free! Some titles are also available in other languages, including Spanish, Thai, Portuguese, Indonesian, Russian, French, German, and Vietnamese*. Available titles may vary by language and region.

Want unlimited reading with no ads? MANGA Plus MAX is just for you! Access over 17,000 chapters in English from anywhere in the world*. Standard Plan will keep you up to date with current ongoing comics. Upgrade to the Deluxe Plan to dive into current comics as well as completed classics like Dragon Ball, NARUTO, BLEACH, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, Death Note, Tokyo Ghoul, Haikyuu! and Bakuman.! *Unavailable in Japan, China, and Korea. Prices and available titles vary by country/region. Only English titles are available in the subscription plan.

Using this official service means that your support goes directly to the creators who work tirelessly to bring you new stories.

Download now and embark on a journey through captivating narratives, with fresh chapters waiting for you every day!

Join a community of good people discussing great stories on Fable, an app designed to find, discuss, and track books and TV shows. Set reading goals, get personalized reading stats, discover new books and shows, and connect with fellow readers in online book clubs and TV clubs. 

TRACK YOUR READING LIFE: Stay organized with beautiful lists, reading goals, and daily streaks that encourage you to read more.
- Organize the books you’re currently into, what’s on your TBR, what you finished, and DNFed
- Import your book lists from Goodreads and Kindle to keep everything in one place
- Build custom lists for all of your niche reading interests
- Build watch lists for the TV shows you’re interested in, currently watching, finished, and more
- Follow lists from other readers for inspiration, and share your own

VIEW PERSONALIZED STATS: Learn more about yourself as a reader with deep insights, charts, and graphs about your reading history.
- Import your lists from Goodreads or Kindle to power your reading stats
- Visualize your progress to your annual reading goal
- See your most-read authors and genres
- See your longest reading streak
- View your average book rating across all the books you finished 

BUILD A READING HABIT WITH STREAKS: Stay motivated with tools designed to help you tackle your reading goals.
- Create daily reading streaks
- Track your book progress daily based on the page or percentage read
- Edit past streaks if you forget to log a day of reading
- Add our home screen widget for one-tap access to your streaks
- Set annual reading goals to challenge yourself
- Get reminders to keep your reading streak alive

CREATE BETTER BOOK REVIEWS: Share your perspective with customized book ratings and book reviews.
- Import your lists and reviews from Goodreads 
- Rate and review books with half-stars (and update your Goodreads ratings with half-stars)
- Add expressive tags to share exactly how the book made you feel
- Add spice level ratings to your book reviews
- Pair your book review with emoji reactions for further customization
- Leave book reviews in your book club’s reflection room or on the book’s detail page

JOIN BOOK & TV CLUBS: Explore thousands of free book and TV clubs for every niche interest, or start your own club to read or watch with friends or family.
- Join your favorite BookTokkers’ book clubs, or start a buddy read to discuss books with friends
- Find clubs led by TV recappers and reviewers from TikTok, YouTube, and elsewhere
- Spark conversations with your club in organized, spoiler-free chapter rooms and episode rooms
- Leave reviews in the reflection room at the end of the book or show
- Read or watch at your own pace or follow the club’s suggested milestones

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS & SHOWS: Find your next favorite book to read or show to watch.
- Use Scout to get personalized book recommendations
- Ask Scout to randomly select your next read from your TBR
- Import your Goodreads or Kindle lists for even more personalization
- Discover new books and shows from Fable’s editorial team
- Follow friends’ lists in the For You feed for community recommendations

BUY EBOOKS DESIGNED FOR INTERACTIVE READING: Experience an entirely new way to read books inside Fable’s custom ebook reader.
- Join other readers who are “social reading” inside thousands of free book clubs
- Annotate books with highlights, notes, tabs, comments, and reactions right inside the book
- Respond to discussion prompts embedded inside the book
- Discover thousands of free books to read inside the Fable app, or shop from our catalog of over one million interactive ebooks

SHOW OFF WHAT YOU READ
- Customize monthly Reading Wraps to highlight the books you read that month
- Come back at the end of the year for an annual wrapup of your year in reading

Terms of use: https://fable.co/terms

All over the world, local libraries offer millions of ebooks and audiobooks. You can borrow them — for free, instantly — with a library card and Libby: the award-winning, much-loved app for libraries. 

• Browse your library’s digital catalog of books — from classics to NYT best-sellers
• Borrow and enjoy ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines
• Download titles for offline reading, or stream them to save space
• Send ebooks to your Kindle (U.S. libraries only)
• Listen to audiobooks via Apple CarPlay
• Use tags to create your must-read list and any other book lists you want
• Keep your reading position automatically synced on all your devices 

In our beautiful, intuitive ebook reader:
• Adjust text size, background color, and book design
• Zoom into magazines and comic books
• Define and search for words and phrases
• Read and listen to read-alongs with your kids
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

In our ground-breaking audio player:
• Slow down or speed up the audio (0.6 to 3.0x)
• Set a sleep timer
• Simply swipe to skip forward and backward
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

Libby is built by the team at OverDrive, in support of local libraries everywhere. 

Happy reading!
